content:
Diagnosis
	1. Extensive stage small cell lung cancer with liver and brain metastases

	Date of diagnosis
	March 2024

	Treatment aim
	Palliative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	Not indicated

	Radiotherapy
	12 Apr 2024 - Completed whole brain radiotherapy 20Gy in 5 fractions

	Chemotherapy
	20 Mar 2024 - 10 Apr 2024 Carboplatin/Etoposide x 2 cycles

	Clinical studies
	Enrolled in MYCN-TARGET-01 Phase 1b trial of novel MYCN inhibitor MYC-789

	Current disease status
	Progressive disease in liver and new bone metastases

	Current issues
	Fatigue, reduced mobility, headaches

	Summary of consultation
	This 58 year old gentleman has been reviewed today following completion of screening for the MYCN-TARGET-01 trial. His disease has unfortunately progressed following two cycles of first-line platinum-etoposide chemotherapy with new bone metastases identified on screening PET-CT dated 25/4/24. Brain MRI shows stable appearances post whole brain radiotherapy.

He meets all eligibility criteria for trial participation including adequate organ function, ECOG PS 2, and confirmed MYCN amplification on recent molecular testing. Trial requirements, schedule of assessments, and potential risks/benefits have been discussed in detail. Written informed consent has been obtained.

	Further investigations
	Baseline ECG and ECHO completed today
Trial protocol biopsies scheduled for 2/5/24

	Medication prescribed
	Dexamethasone 4mg bd
Ondansetron 8mg bd prn

	Follow up
	Cycle 1 Day 1 of trial treatment scheduled for 3/5/24
Weekly trial assessments for first 28 days

	Required GP actions
	Weekly FBC, U&E, LFTs as per trial protocol
Urgent review if fever or new symptoms

primary_cancer.metastases: liver metastases, brain metastases, new bone metastases

cancer_timeline.value: Completed whole brain radiotherapy 20Gy in 5 fractions
PET-CT shows progressive disease with new bone metastases
Enrolled in MYCN-TARGET-01 Phase 1b trial of novel MYCN inhibitor MYC-789

patient_facts.value: Brain MRI shows stable appearances post whole brain radiotherapy

status_updates.value: Extensive stage SCLC progressing after first-line chemotherapy. Enrolled in Phase 1b trial of MYCN inhibitor following confirmation of eligibility criteria
Progressive disease with new bone metastases on PET-CT
Baseline ECG and ECHO completed today, trial protocol biopsies scheduled for 2/5/24
Cycle 1 Day 1 of trial treatment scheduled for 3/5/24 with weekly trial assessments for first 28 days
